document_data.name: Accelerate Healing
document_data.mainbody: '''''Accelerate healing''''' was an uncommon [[divine]] healing [[spell]] granted to [[cleric]]s by their deities.
document_data.Effects:
''Accelerate healing'' was a self-descriptive spell that, when cast, hastened the target creature's natural healing. The spell's effects last from one to four days.

The spell did not affect other forms of magical healing, including spells, [[magic item]]s, or ''[[potions of healing]]''.
document_data.Components: The spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
document_data.Notable Users: *[[Shinthala Deepcrest]], the Grand Cabal of the [[Emerald Enclave]] ''circa'' [[1370 DR]].
document_data.History: It was recorded in ''[[Flame of the Spirit]]'', a holy artifact of the [[Tymoran]] faith. Occasionally, the goddess granted individuals who held the item access to spells, including ''accelerate healing''. It was also recorded in ''[[Yornar's Trail Companion]]'', a holy text of the [[church of Mielikki]].<ref>
